title: If Gragas's E+Flash is to be removed, it need to go from everyone else too
body:
Meddler mentioned recently they will take a look at Gragas's E hitbox and flash interaction, possibly removing that function.

Effective or not with other champs {{champion:254}} {{champion:98}} , it would be too confusing and unfair if a champ can flash during a dash and some others can't.

replies.body:
Kinda yes but with Gragas thing is complicated because Shen has no powerful followup ability, he just taunts and deals damage nothing more. Gragas on the other hand apart from dealing damage and applying CC reliably makes picks by knocking vital target to his team while disrupting everyone that could help said target effectively making them autolose every teamfight just by Gragas not having Flash on cooldown. They can win in that situation when Gragas somehow fucks up that combo which happens rarely.

I don't want E Flash interaction gone because of consistency with similar abilities, skillcap but as long as Gragas can remove someone from game for like 1.2 second without any time to react, ability to dodge then it's doomed to be unbalanceable and needs to go. Solution to it may be removing hard CC on E and replacing it with slow as it gives target opportunity to slightly change direction of displacement or flash/dash out of it. Fatty may still predict that and throw cask accordingly or he can buffer his R during E (it's not so reliable but might take opponent by surprise).

You forget that his ult's travel time is now universally the same no matter how far he throws it, making it impossible to 100% CC chain people with e and r.

With this in mind, to actually successfully knock someone into your team as gragas, you have to throw your r as you are in the middle of your e animation. If you e-flash then r, there is no animation to time the r with. If you don't time it right, the enemy has the opportunity to flash/use a movement spell to either get out of range of the cask after your e stun fades away, or to get onto the other side and get pushed away.

In other words, his ulti isn't a free "knock into your team" anymore. Most new gragas players wait until they land their e, giving the enemy a few moments to react.

His base damages are high, but his ratios are not high enough to warrant building him full/mostly damage. This is how it is with almost all tanks.

TL:DR why are people complaining about nerfing the 49% WR jungler when there are other tank junglers that outclass him right now? _Mundo_ jg has a higher WR than him right now and Mundo brings almost 0 utility to his team. I agree that if they nerf things like Sej, Cho, and Mao then they should certainly tune him down, but other than his e hitbox he doesn't need any nerfs right now.

E Flash removal isn't 100% sure, what's sure though is that they want to reduce his ridiculous hitbox which alone massively hits attractiveness of Gragas as a Tank. Likes of Sejuani, Zac, Maokai will outclass him just by that small change. And that's fine since they want to potentially push him more into damage heavier builds BUT further potential change is removing E Flash interaction. It isn't sure how build changes will affect Fatman and getting rid of that interaction may lead to some big compensations and potentially even small scale rework of a champion.
